snippet: A business executive and 14 of his companies are accused of conspiring with Iran to sell that country’s oil in defiance of international restrictions.
abstract: United States blacklists Greek business executive Dimitris Cambis and 14 of his companies, accusing them of conspiring with Iran to acquire eight large petroleum tankers used to transport Iranian oil to unwitting foreign customers in defiance of Western economic sanctions.
lead_paragraph: A business executive and 14 of his companies are accused of conspiring with Iran to sell that country’s oil in defiance of international restrictions.

headline.seo: U.S. Says a Greek Helped Iran Evade Sanctions
headline.main: U.S. Says Greek Executive Evaded Sanctions on Iran
headline.print_headline: Tycoon Evaded Iran Sanctions, U.S. Says
